name: RoboCindy: The Girl with no Emotions
name_original: RoboCindy: The Girl with no Emotions
description:
Alex, a boy with too many emotions, is dared by his friends to ask out RoboCindy: a strange girl with no emotions.

RoboCindy is a 2D top down RPG /Visual Novel made using RPG Maker MV

CURRENT VERSION LOG - Version 1.3:

  • Updated Gameplay
  • Updated/Extended Story
  • New Visuals
  • Removed Herobrine

Version 1.2:

  • Fixed BUG that cause endless battle loop
  • Fixed visual BUG on lockers
